channel.title: How to make an emote admin only?
channel.description:
I need help making an emote admin only.. i know it needs to have playerRights >= 2 but idk the rest plz help.. thank you!
P.S. I searched everywhere on forums for about a day now..!

item.title: How to make an emote admin only?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

find the case for the emote if your talking about the emots that you click on and put
if (playerRights >2){
preform emot stuff
}else{
sendMessage(“you are not admin”);
}

you can also do the same thing to a command where you type in the “::” .

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an emote admin only?
